# ixapi_metro_area (Data Source)

Use the `metro_area` datasource to retrieve a metro area by un_locode or iata_code



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `display_name` (String)
- `iata_code` (String)
- `un_locode` (String)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
